thread.title: Apple may launch new iPhone in Sept
thread.title_full: Apple may launch new iPhone in Sept | Business Spectator

author: AP
title: Apple may launch new iPhone in Sept
text:
Apple has announced plans for a new product event in September in San Francisco with the giant tech company expected to show off new iPhones and other gadgets.
Invitations for the event on September 9 were sent to reporters and analysts on Thursday morning.
As usual, Apple is only hinting at what to expect.
The invitations mention Apple's digital assistant, Siri.
The company has previously said it plans to expand Siri's features in the new version of its operating software for iPhones and iPads.
Along with a new iPhone model, tech industry insiders have speculated Apple may introduce a larger iPad and a new set-top box for television sets.
The company however has not confirmed any plans.
